attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A new logo has recently  been unveiled for the 2012 London Olympics. It is unclear, and has a harsh angularity which is regrettably reminiscent of the swastika.

It should be replaced with a fresh, inspiring, design as quickly as possible.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
